Methods for
Research & Design

UX methods at a glance for your next project

Finding a laundry list of the many UX Design methods can be quite an effort. This reference tool is designed to give you a quick overview of the various Research and Design methods that UX Designers employ in their process.

Happy exploring!








Initial Exploration phase

Methods that designers use to understand users, their needs, technology and system in the initial stages of your project.

Design phase

Methods that designers use to synthesize gathered data and move towards design and concept building.
